Create a Cloudflare D1 Database"}],"type":"h4","id":"1794ef77-1229-4315-8c07-8b10f80144b7"},{"children":[{"text":"Run the following command to create a Cloudflare D1 database:"}],"type":"p","id":"67bd14ac-aa80-4399-a405-836ae34db2ed"},{"children":[{"children":[{"text":"npx wrangler d1 create penx-blog"}],"type":"code_line","id":"20b6ee93-b165-4948-95b4-feeb5498ebfd"}],"lang":"bash","type":"code_block","id":"1bd5fa76-fe49-42fe-b858-4ce71ff52b00"},{"children":[{"text":"If successful, you will see a confirmation message similar to this:"}],"type":"p","id":"0329e6f9-1bde-4b3e-beeb-565cfa50d080"},{"children":[{"children":[{"text":"✅ Successfully created DB 'penx-blog' in region WNAM"}],"type":"code_line","id":"3e158c0e-3d58-4f0b-85c0-16f7b18befb2"},{"children":[{"text":"Created your new D1 database."}],"type":"code_line","id":"bab61cae-999f-415f-a7ad-94f268c96a05"},{"children":[{"text":""}],"type":"code_line","id":"268cc92a-c989-4ee8-8a8d-c0bff7dca36d"},{"children":[{"text":"[[d1_databases]]"}],"type":"code_line","id":"143bf32e-858c-40e1-9ad2-aabc6078b57c"},{"children":[{"text":"binding = \"DB\""}],"type":"code_line","id":"20a3233e-263b-45b7-83fb-b7335d5bc143"},{"children":[{"text":"database_name = \"penx-blog\""}],"type":"code_line","id":"94bf806d-3277-4d46-9d24-fccf93775de2"},{"children":[{"text":"database_id = \"00e31c14-e6ae-4612-9bc3-d25c6a1f8023d\""}],"type":"code_line","id":"86e4fb96-81e1-43d3-808f-41b21b671969"}],"type":"code_block","id":"c5bec063-acbb-483d-b5e8-196d69633dc2"},{"children":[{"text":"Copy the "},{"text":"database_id","code":true},{"text":" and update it in your "},{"text":"wrangler.toml","code":true},{"text":" file."}],"type":"p","id":"62ec11f1-d9e3-4542-8859-fa7d7870121a"},{"children":[{"text":"4. Create Cloudflare R2 Bucket"}],"type":"h4","id":"7765d85d-26aa-4ace-9c62-394065789c0d"},{"children":[{"text":"Before create R2 Bucket, you need to bind a credit card to Cloudflare."}],"type":"blockquote","id":"fb0420d2-b123-4693-9280-e6248c640296"},{"children":[{"text":"Create a Cloudflare R2 bucket by running:"}],"type":"p","id":"3ffd7a4e-8c4f-4c74-80c3-af8662ee2941"},{"children":[{"children":[{"text":"npx wrangler r2 bucket create penx-bucket"}],"type":"code_line","id":"becfb30b-2011-4aa9-9147-dbe143c3ee74"}],"lang":"bash","type":"code_block","id":"bd8fb91c-5089-4d09-a2d7-60e5d2da2178"},{"children":[{"text":"You should receive a message confirming the creation of the bucket:"}],"type":"p","id":"e99ef094-85b1-493a-b356-0347af1edc34"},{"children":[{"children":[{"text":"✅ Created bucket 'penx-bucket' with default storage class of Standard."}],"type":"code_line","id":"1f0e26af-311c-4006-bbf3-f63294633149"},{"children":[{"text":""}],"type":"code_line","id":"09061b50-c285-4a8e-916a-6b1a9e25dfb0"},{"children":[{"text":"Configure your Worker to write objects to this bucket:"}],"type":"code_line","id":"12fec173-2029-4d6b-a550-b77c560769a8"},{"children":[{"text":""}],"type":"code_line","id":"1ac655f4-0038-4fe8-ad01-c67735e4fe47"},{"children":[{"text":"[[r2_buckets]]"}],"type":"code_line","id":"f774d56b-3d39-4a02-8862-8509e0bbcc9c"},{"children":[{"text":"bucket_name = \"penx-bucket\""}],"type":"code_line","id":"ea0c5b7a-66ea-45ad-9f6e-7205b2c1cd4c"},{"children":[{"text":"binding = \"penx_bucket\""}],"type":"code_line","id":"ac8b1a7b-646c-462d-a3e2-29ac4040527d"}],"type":"code_block","id":"4e6e611f-86a5-4cd5-bf4b-95706414fd7b"},{"children":[{"text":"5. Deploy to Cloudflare Pages"}],"type":"h4","id":"afa51fd6-ac12-4f67-8a64-a438d478d880"},{"children":[{"text":"Finally, deploy your blog by running these commands:"}],"type":"p","id":"e4949a18-80e6-4d47-8163-002b17dc50e3"},{"children":[{"children":[{"text":"pnpm install"}],"type":"code_line","id":"aa2bd8ce-5879-4531-bd81-b5397dcc666a"},{"children":[{"text":"pnpm run db:generate # Required for initial release"}],"type":"code_line","id":"c5caf6e8-ecce-4956-ad65-12a919d93fa8"},{"children":[{"text":"pnpm run db:migrate:prod # Required for initial release"}],"type":"code_line","id":"7b619b90-3f1c-4b70-b97d-ca5265346404"},{"children":[{"text":"pnpm run deploy"}],"type":"code_line","id":"27713003-49c8-44e1-aa31-74051b7f608a"}],"lang":"bash","type":"code_block","id":"7fc85f81-550d-418c-acbb-2a67ae85ca18"},{"children":[{"text":"Upon successful deployment, you will receive a URL like: https://penx-cloudflare.pages.dev."}],"type":"p","id":"c844e160-dcf5-4fe1-a933-7cebdd30f9a0"},{"children":[{"text":"Examples Blogs"}],"type":"h3","id":"0e1eb579-092a-42b3-a6da-a24b4ed8f3cc"},{"children":[{"text":"https://my-penx-blog.pages.dev"}],"indent":1,"listStyleType":"disc","type":"p","id":"7552b7fc-005f-4ef7-94aa-435e482f6867"},{"children":[{"text":"https://demo1.penx.io"}],"indent":1,"listStyleType":"disc","type":"p","id":"f51ed84d-a275-41ad-81e1-ef056056a656","listStart":2},{"children":[{"text":"https://demo2.penx.io"}],"indent":1,"listStyleType":"disc","type":"p","id":"7b82affa-487b-49fc-98c1-9b11b4114a57","listStart":3},{"children":[{"text":"https://demo3.penx.io"}],"indent":1,"listStyleType":"disc","type":"p","id":"942c210f-3222-40a5-91b6-6fb9fe139f6f","listStart":4},{"children":[{"text":"https://demo4.penx.io"}],"indent":1,"listStyleType":"disc","type":"p","id":"48708e76-c552-4616-afd6-18755e4d907f","listStart":5}]
